sentences.sContent: The club’s priority is to win the League.
sentences.sCn: 该俱乐部首先考虑的是要赢得联赛。

sentences.sContent: After several burglaries in the area, security is now a high priority (= very important and needing attention soon ) .
sentences.sCn: 该地区发生了几宗入室盗窃案以后，治安成了当务之急。

sentences.sContent: With so little money available, repairs must remain a low priority (= not important and not needing attention soon ) .
sentences.sCn: 可用的钱这么少，只好暂时放下维修事宜了。

sentences.sContent: The customer is high on our list of priorities .
sentences.sCn: 顾客在我们的心目中排在第一位。

sentences.sContent: List your tasks in order of priority (= most important first ) .
sentences.sCn: 按照轻重缓急列出你的工作。

synos.tran: [通信][计]优先；优先权；[数]优先次序；优先考虑的事

phrases.pCn: 次重要优先项目(或问题)
优先邮件（美国邮政的邮件类型之一，在邮件分检系统内享有优先处理的特权）
优先秩序，轻重缓急次序
制定优先次序；优先级设立
共享颐年优先配屋计划

words.tran: 把事情按优先顺序排好

trans.tranCn: 先, 前, 优先, 优先权
trans.tranOther: the thing that you think is most important and that needs attention before anything else
